channel.title: RuneX Blitz
channel.description:
Hey guys, i'm gonna get straight to the point. I'm needing one or two coders who can help me code a new upcoming server i'm going to do called RuneX Blitz.
RuneX Blitz will be based on Project 16 v3 (WhiteScape Edited) and will highlight the best bits of runescape.
If you are interested, please post a reply.
Server-sided coders: -Bill_ - -
Alpha Phase Testers: -Loveandpower - Thanks
Bill
